@graph.name: Understanding Barcodes
@graph.description:
## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Understanding Barcodes](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/single-cell/tutorials/scrna-umis/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)

## Features

* Includes [Galaxy Workflow Tests](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/faqs/gtn/workflow_run_test.html)
* Includes a [Galaxy Workflow Report](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/faqs/galaxy/workflows_report_view.html)
